faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about MAJAZ

whatIsMajaz.a: MAJAZ is a premium vehicle assessment and concierge service serving Dubai and the UAE. We provide expert pre-purchase inspections, market analysis, and optional bidding services to protect your automotive investment.

howLong.q: How long does an assessment take?
howLong.a: Depending on your chosen service tier: 48 hours (standard), 24 hours (express), or same-day. On-site inspections may require scheduling based on vehicle location.

coverage.a: We support all major UAE platforms including Emirates Auction, Awalmaz ad, dubizzle Motors, CarSwitch, AutoTrader UAE, and more.

currencies.a: We accept AED (UAE Dirham), USD, and EUR. Payments can be made securely via Stripe with any major international credit or debit card.

deposit.a: If you choose delegated bidding, we hold a 20% deposit (of your maximum bid) via Stripe. If the auction is won, the deposit is applied to your purchase. If lost or cancelled, it's fully refunded within 5 business days.

refund.a: Service fees are non-refundable once assessment begins. Deposits for bidding services are refundable per outcome rules. Full refund if we cannot complete the assessment for technical reasons.

remote.q: What's included in a remote assessment?
remote.a: We scrape the complete listing, extract all vehicle data, analyze market comparables, calculate fair value range, provide a safe maximum bid recommendation, assess risks, and deliver a comprehensive PDF report.

onsite.q: What happens during an on-site inspection?
onsite.a: Our certified inspector physically examines the vehicle, conducts a test drive, checks mechanical systems, measures paint thickness, inspects the undercarriage, documents everything with photos and video, and provides expert observations.

accuracy.a: Our estimates combine AI-powered market analysis with real comparable sales data and expert human review. While no estimate is perfect, our methodology has proven highly accurate across thousands of assessments.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded in Dubai, MAJAZ was born from a simple vision: to bring transparency and trust to the pre-owned vehicle market. We've assembled a team of certified inspectors, automotive experts, and technology specialists to create the most comprehensive vehicle assessment service in the UAE.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To empower buyers with the knowledge and confidence they need to make informed automotive investment decisions. Every assessment we conduct, every report we deliver, is built on a foundation of expertise, honesty, and unwavering commitment to our clients' best interests.

agreement.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: By accessing and using MAJAZ services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

services.title: 2. Services Provided
services.content: MAJAZ provides vehicle assessment, inspection, market analysis, and optional bidding concierge services. All assessments are provided for informational purposes and should not be considered as legal, financial, or investment advice.

fees.title: 3. Fees and Payments
fees.content: Service fees are charged upfront and are non-refundable once assessment work begins. Optional deposits for bidding services are held via Stripe and refunded or applied according to auction outcomes. All fees are clearly disclosed before payment.

accuracy.title: 4. Assessment Accuracy
accuracy.content: While we strive for accuracy in all assessments, MAJAZ makes no warranties about the completeness or accuracy of valuations, estimates, or recommendations. Market conditions change rapidly and final purchase decisions are the buyer's responsibility.

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: MAJAZ's liability is limited to the amount of fees paid for the specific service. We are not responsible for auction outcomes, vehicle condition discrepancies discovered post-purchase, or market value fluctuations.

refunds.title: 6. Refund Policy
refunds.content: Service fees are non-refundable once work has commenced. Bidding deposits are refundable per auction outcome rules. If we cannot complete an assessment for technical reasons, a full refund will be issued within 5-7 business days.

privacy.title: 7. Privacy and Data
privacy.content: We collect and process personal information as described in our Privacy Policy. All payment information is processed securely through Stripe and never stored on our servers.

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.content: MAJAZ reserves the right to refuse service or terminate accounts for violation of these terms, fraudulent activity, or any reason at our discretion.

changes.title: 9. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these terms at any time. Continued use of MAJAZ services after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

governing.title: 10. Governing Law
governing.content: These terms are governed by the laws of the United Arab Emirates. Any disputes shall be resolved in Dubai courts.

contact.title: 11. Contact
contact.content: For questions about these terms, contact us at legal@majaz.ae
